name: Monster Mosh
description:
On Halloween night, a rocker wakes up the dead with his fantastic music!

The ghouls are thirsty for some sick beats, so rock out while performing tricks to satisfy their want for chaos!

Gameplay:

  • Use the arrow keys to do tricks to keep your chaos meter above zero
  • Jump on beat for an extra point multiplier

Game in alpha. Updates may or may not come.

Made with <3 by:
Remy Streichenberger - Design, Programming, and Audio
Jordan Latta - Programming, UI, and Audio
Kayleigh S. Manchester - Characters and Backgrounds
Eli Mcardle - Programming and UI
Kyle Gunger - Programming, UI, and Audio

Song: Rock Thing by Creo (creo-music.com) (CC BY 4.0)

Original version for the Spartasoft "Riot" themed Game Jam
